scripts.dev: npx tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && cp src/snarky.d.ts dist/node/snarky.d.ts
scripts.build: rm -rf dist/node && npx tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && cp -r src/node_bindings dist/node/_node_bindings && node src/build/buildNode.js && cp src/snarky.d.ts dist/node/snarky.d.ts
scripts.serve:web: cp src/chrome_bindings/server.py src/chrome_bindings/index.html dist/web && cd dist/web && python3 server.py
scripts.prepublish:node: npm run build && NODE_ENV=production node src/build/buildNode.js
scripts.prepublish:both: npm run prepublish:web && npm run prepublish:node
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run prepublish:web && npm run prepublish:node
scripts.bootstrap: npm run build && node src/build/extractJsooMethods.cjs && npm run build
scripts.test: for f in ./src/**/*.test.ts; do NODE_OPTIONS=--experimental-vm-modules npx jest $f; done
